Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Class AbstractMeterElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.AbstractMeterElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DescriptionLabel, ValueLabel
    abstract class AbstractMeterElement
extends Object
    Base class to map the meter charts labels, value and description.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Returns true if the font size of the rendering will be automatically calculated, based on dimension of the area for rendering.
